profile_description:
Ferrari
Welcome to the official account of Ferrari, Italian Excellence that makes the world dream. #DrivingFerrari
www.ferrari.com

posts.description:
The #FerrariF8Tributo offers the wild V8 turbocharged engine performance combined with thrilling dynamics. Moreover the comfort and the superior ease of driving make it perfect even for daily trips.⁣
#Ferrari #Hatta #DrivingFerrari

Here is another chapter of the voyage of rediscovery aboard the #FerrariPortofinoM. Today we are in Viterbo, an ancient town full of history: what a spot to showcase the unprecedented combination of authentic GT performance and driving pleasure.⁣
#Ferrari #Viterbo #Italy

The #FerrariF40 is one of the most loved supercars ever and was also one of the most successful on track in the new #FerrariF40Competizione version. This Tailor Made #Ferrari488Pista draws inspiration from its legendary story, carrying on these days a memorable livery that combines the sportiest colours such as “Bianco Arctic”, “Rosso Corsa” and “Giallo Modena”.⁣
#Ferrari #FerrariTailorMade

The #FerrariGTTour in Black Forest is almost here. A stunning escape into one of Europe’s most enchanting regions will be the perfect chance to experience the power and performance of #Ferrari models. Take a look at some photos from the last stop in Langhe, and prepare for a new adventure.⁣
⁣
Contact your official Ferrari Dealer to join this adventure.

The #FerrariSF90Spider is not only the most powerful production car ever to come out from Maranello. It is the perfect synthesis between extreme performance and the purest futuristic beauty.⁣
#Ferrari @blackbirdferrari
